# Generated by pandoc-plot 0.8.0.0

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import array as arr
import math as math

s = arr.array('f')
h = arr.array('f')

last = 0
n = 30
for i in range(0, n):
    last += 1 / (n + 1)
    s.append(last)
    h.append(-(1 - last) * math.log(last) - last * math.log(1 - last))

plt.figure()
plt.plot(s, h)
plt.xlabel('$S$')
plt.ylabel('$-(1-S)\log S - S\log (1 - S)$')
plt.title('Cross entropy with mismatched distribution')
